entry.def: To sever something means to cut completely through it or to cut it completely off.

example.ex: Richardson severed his right foot in a motorbike accident.
example.tran: 理查森在一次摩托车事故中失去了他的右脚。

example.ex: ...oil still gushing from a severed fuel line.
example.tran: 石油仍然从被切断的燃料运输管中喷涌而出

entry.def: If you sever a relationship or connection that you have with someone, you end it suddenly and completely.

example.ex: She severed her ties with England...
example.tran: 她断绝了和英国的往来。

example.ex: He was able to sever all emotional bonds to his family.
example.tran: 他切断了和家人的所有感情纽带。
